item.title: Version 1.0.6+70
item.description: 1.0.6+70: Fixed mode dropdown! Added rank icons to comp match tiles. Added explosion to round kill feed, it should be complete now. Changed color of round result icons. Changed color of round wins/losses on the tile to enhance clarity. Added unique gradient for aces in the kill feed.
